location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 11 to Captain Adam Sheriff, Commander of the EagleSnow, from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter requests that Sheriff go to Bussora [Basra] with a number of packets and once he arrives there, to follow orders from the council. It also warns of attacks by the Chaub [the Banu Ka'b tribal confederacy] said to be active with a number of ships in the Bussora river area.
